Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Jackson
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line  trains are standing at Jackson due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line  trains are standing at Jackson due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem near O'Hare. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem near O'Hare.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem near O'Hare. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem near O'Hare.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
